about_the_game: Ever wondered what the wonderful dishes mentioned in this culinary adventure taste like? We present you with the official cookbook from "Sushi for Empress Setsuko". Savour and enjoy these delicious dishes and imagine yourself living the adventures in the Shio Islands.
detailed_description: Ever wondered what the wonderful dishes mentioned in this culinary adventure taste like? We present you with the official cookbook from "Sushi for Empress Setsuko". Savour and enjoy these delicious dishes and imagine yourself living the adventures in the Shio Islands.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better.
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

name: Sushi for Empress Setsuko Cookbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
